doc:
Susan Batson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_Batson 0 Susan Batson is an American producer, actress, author, acting coach, and a life member of the Actors Studio. Susan's mother, Ruth Batson, was a noted civil rights activist. She trained with Harold Clurman, Uta Hagen, Herbert Berghof, and Lee Strasberg. She coaches actresses such as Nicole Kidman and Juliette Binoche. Susan Batson is considered one of the most significant coaches in the world. Susan_Batson is an_American_producer_,_actress_,_author , acting coach , and a_life_member of the_Actors_Studio . Susan 's_mother , Ruth_Batson , was a_noted_civil_rights_activist . She trained with Harold_Clurman , Uta_Hagen , Herbert_Berghof , and Lee_Strasberg . She coaches actresses such_as Nicole_Kidman and Juliette_Binoche . Susan_Batson is_considered one of the_most_significant_coaches in the_world .
